Class Game

java.lang.Object
Scoreboard
Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer

    • getChoiceAt

      public String getChoiceAt​(int i)
      Gets the choice at the i value passed in from the choices passed in from the sport chosen
      Parameters:
      i - i value passed in from a for loop in main
      Returns:
      Returns the choice at that i value

    • setGameChoices

      public void setGameChoices​(String[] input, int length)
      Sets the gameChoices string array in Game from the one passed in from whichever sport is chosen in main
      Parameters:
      input - String array passed in from the chosen sport
      length - Length of the array to set the new array size

      length - Length of the array to set the new array size

    • isOver

      public abstract boolean isOver()
      Checks to see if the game is over based on the current period
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value that is used to keep the while loop going
